EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Gartner_TopChallengesFacingI&OLeaders_AR_Q118.Downloa
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Top Challenges Facing I&O Leaders in 2018, and What to Do About Them
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for viewing the Top Challenges Facing I&O Leaders in 2018, and What to Do About Them Gartner report. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-gartners-top-challenges-facing-io-leaders-in-2018-and-what-to-do-about-them]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C.
Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
